attributes.action: Referendum On British Pound For Scotland
attributes.additional_details:
The people of Scotland have been granted a referendum to vote for Scottish independence using the bank of England as lender of last resort.

They have the right to hold this referendum, but the rest of the United Kingdom should be allowed to vote on whether we should be the lender of last resort.

The British pound should remain  with what's left of the United Kingdom and an independent Scotland should have their own currency not ours.
